articles.description: The $69 billion merger is really happening, thanks to a UK regulatory decision.

articles.author: Jacob Roach
articles.title: Nvidia is cheating with its GPUs, and that’s great for laptops - Digital Trends
articles.description: Nvidia's new laptop graphics cards are powerful, but they recieve the biggest boost from DLSS 3, especially in machines traditionally built for gaming.
articles.content:
With some AI trickery, Nvidia has managed to cheat the traditional rendering pipeline for games. And that makes traditionally underpowered laptops so much better.
Its latest RTX 40-series mobile GPU… [+4703 chars]
